titleStmt.title: The besieging of Berghen vppon Zoom by the Prince of Parma in the monethes of September and October last 1588

notesStmt.note: A woodcut map with letterpress descriptive text.
"Cut up into 3 pieces and ounted on a leaf of L*. 7. 13."--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
